quotes.quote: The worst time is always the present.
The worst of lusts is vanity.
The worst is feeling worthless.
Let the worst come to the worst.
The worst decision is indecision.
Silence can be the worst ridicule.
Poverty is the worst form of death.
Gossip is the worst form of judging.
The worst pain in the world is shame.
Mankind's worst enemy is fear of work.
The worst hatred is that of relatives.
The worst deluded are the self-deluded.
Being afraid is the worst sin there is.
The worst prison would be a closed heart.
The worst happens when you least expect it.
The worst happens, and life still goes on.
The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
The worst thing about cynicism is its truth.
The worst evils are those that never arrive.
The worst thing is a rainy day with no laughs
The worst of all deceptions is self-deception.
The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves.
The worst disability in life is a bad attitude.
The worst guilt is to accept an unearned guilt.
The worst ruler is one who cannot rule himself.
Our worst pain is confined within our own skin.
The worst of all diseases is a nervous ability.
Man's worst enemies are boredom and discontent.
The future is the worst thing about the present.
The worst thing you can do with money is save it.
